page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: Hampden Park and Langney are both a part of Eastbourne,which is situated by the coast.Hampden Park and Langney consist mostly of housing estates.I live in Hampden Park,at the moment there is some building going on not far from my house,the building is going to be a cold store for Anglo Dutch Meats.There is a big industrial estate near me which has many types of factories on it,we also have a lot of rough grazing land which used to be marshland but has been drained,but hopefully the council are going to turn it into a big park.There are a number of shops in Hampden Park,and a shopping centre at Langney.In Hampden Park we have a big Queensway furniture store, and a railway station and a park and I think that Hampden Park is a friendly community to live in. {By Lee Barklimore Age 11
